tool.name: ListJobsUsingQuery
tool.summary:
This GP tool allows the user to run one of the public queries in the Workflow Manager database, then returns a list containing the IDs of the jobs that matched this query.

NOTE: User-specific queries cannot be executed by this tool.
tool.usage: • The default Workflow Manager database must be set before running this tool.

param.name: in_string_queryName
param.displayname: Name of the query to use
param.dialogReference: The name of the public job query to be run. Note that queries located within folders or subfolders must have the complete query location specified.
param.pythonReference: The name of the public job query to be run. Note that queries located within folders or subfolders must have the complete query location specified.

param.name: in_string_wmxDatabaseAlias
param.dialogReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.
param.pythonReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This GP tool allows the user to run one of the public queries in the Workflow Manager database, then returns a list containing the IDs of the jobs that matched this query.

NOTE: User-specific queries cannot be executed by this tool.
